chapter.text: The Social Experiments were created because,^500 for some reason,^500 Generation 1 had a much stronger connection to you than I initially did. ^1500So I used that,^500 had Hetch create something to pander to you all a bit,^500 to draw you in.^1500 I think he did a pretty good job at that. ^1500I did have to come in and rearrange a few things of course after the fact,^500 but it was a wonderful creation to show you.
